noDreamsYet: You haven't woven any dreams yet!
clickNewEntry: Click "New Entry" to start your journey.
titlePlaceholder: A memorable title for your dream or thought
contentPlaceholder: Describe your dream, thoughts, or ideas here...
apiKeyMessageBasic: Google Gemini API key is not set. Please ensure you have a valid, paid API key selected for this feature.
apiKeyMessageImage: This feature requires a paid API key. Please select one through the 'Select API Key' option.
learnAboutBilling: Learn more about Gemini API billing
prompt_hiddenGarden: Imagine a hidden garden where time flows backward. What do you see?
prompt_dreamMap: You discover a map to a place that exists only in your dreams. Where does it lead?
prompt_speakingAnimal: Describe a conversation with an animal that suddenly gained the power of speech.
prompt_emotionsAsColors: What if emotions had colors you could see? Describe a scene where they are visible.
prompt_forgottenLullaby: A forgotten lullaby plays in the distance. What memories does it awaken?
prompt_stardustCreature: Create an image of a whimsical creature made of stardust and moonlight.
prompt_futuristicCity: Visualize a futuristic city where nature has reclaimed its space.
prompt_readingNook: Imagine a cozy reading nook suspended in the clouds, with a view of a fantastical landscape.
systemInstruction_dreamInterpreter: You are a dream interpreter and creative assistant. Provide insightful, imaginative, and positive interpretations of dreams. Focus on symbolism, emotional resonance, and potential creative insights. Avoid overly literal or negative interpretations. Encourage the user's creativity.
systemInstruction_storySpark: You are a creative writing assistant. Given a piece of text, offer a few engaging and imaginative suggestions for how the story could continue or new plot twists. Keep suggestions concise and inspiring.
systemInstruction_aiVisualizer: You are an imaginative visual artist. Based on keywords or descriptions, generate a single, abstract, and evocative image prompt that captures the essence of the input. Focus on mood, color, and unique elements.
apiError_noApiKey: API key not found. Ensure API_KEY is set or select one.
apiError_paidApiKeyRequired: API key error: This feature requires a paid API key. Please select one through the 'Select API Key' option.
apiError_couldNotVerifyKey: Could not verify API key status.
apiError_selectionInitiated: API key selection initiated. Please verify in the dialog.
apiError_selectionNotAvailable: API key selection not available in this environment. Ensure your API_KEY is set.
apiError_noTextContent: No text content received from Gemini API.
apiError_noImageData: No image data received from Gemini API.
apiError_provideTextOrImage: Please provide either text or an image for dream interpretation.
